body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Passport Stamp Locations              Passport Stamps           The Passport program was started in 1986 by Eastern National Parks Association. It was established to help visitors discover the beauty and history found in America's National Parks. These stamps record the name of the park and the date of your visit.  For more Passport book information, visit Eastern National.  C&O Canal Passport Stamp Locations   Williamsport Visitor Center  Great Falls Tavern  Hancock Visitor Center   Brunswick Visitor Center Ferry Hill Plantation  Cumberland Visitor Center
title: Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park: Passport Stamp Locations
